func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its edge length.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of an edge of the cube.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a right circular cone given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_circle

func_sig.description: Calculate the visible area of the circle above the x-axis given its diameter.
func_sig.name: calculate_visible_part_of_circle
